snippet: The United National Party demanded a parliamentary investigation into the deaths of 27 inmates after a riot.
abstract: Sri Lanka's United National Party, main opposition party, says 27 prison inmates died in riot and demands a parliamentary investigation into episode.
lead_paragraph: The United National Party demanded a parliamentary investigation into the deaths of 27 inmates after a riot.

headline.seo: Sri Lanka Opposition Says 27 Prisoners Died in a ‘Massacre’
headline.main: Sri Lanka Opposition Says 27 Prisoners Died in a ‘Massacre’
headline.print_headline: Sri Lanka Opposition Says 27 Prisoners Died in a ‘Massacre’
